title: fuck matchmaking in normals
body:
trying to learn a new fkin champ and 3 games in a row the enemy has had a plat+ adc and the lane has lost like 1-19 or worse and we all get raped. im silver. get your shit together riot fuck me.

p.s i am top lane in said games

replies.body: If you play normals you can't expect fair matchmaking. Plat players are easily beatable because you will have someone of close to or equal skin on your team.
yeah true true it just sucks when you gotta lane against them =P especially if your using an unfamiliar character.
